text: Not sure if anyone is actually using this, but I made some rewrite of my old bpe package recently. Many things are changed, you should be able to learn a more customized bpe map with it now. <https://github.com/chengchingwen/BytePairEncoding.jl>

elements.text: Not sure if anyone is actually using this, but I made some rewrite of my old bpe package recently. Many things are changed, you should be able to learn a more customized bpe map with it now.

text: This seems awesome. I always wanted to compare byte pair encoding to the ngram method, which is default in JsonGrinder / Mill.jl. Thanks.
